snippet: Chris Correa, the Cardinals’ scouting director, was fired, according to an official with direct knowledge of the decision. Correa once worked for Astros General Manager Jeff Luhnow.
abstract: St Louis Cardinals fire their scouting director Chris Correa amid team's alleged hacking of Houston Astros database.
lead_paragraph: Chris Correa, the Cardinals’ scouting director, was fired, according to an official with direct knowledge of the decision. Correa once worked for Astros General Manager Jeff Luhnow.

headline.main: Cardinals Fire Rising Front-Office Star Amid Hacking Investigation
headline.print_headline: Cardinals Fire Director of Scouting Amid Scandal
